name: gamess-ri-mp2-miniapp

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
The GAMESS RI-MP2 mini-app computes the correlation energy with the
Hartree-Fock energy and wave-function given as inputs. The inputs were
generated from GAMESS.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description:
Arm Performance Libraries provides optimized standard core math
libraries for high-performance computing applications on Arm processors.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Mvapich is a High-Performance MPI Library for clusters with diverse
networks (InfiniBand, Omni-Path, Ethernet/iWARP, and RoCE) and computing
platforms (x86 (Intel and AMD), ARM and OpenPOWER)
